Alarak.name: Alarak
Alarak.title: Highlord
Alarak.Description: A Tank who specializes against Mages thanks in part to his innate Spell Armor.20 Spell Armor

AlarakDiscordStrike.name: Discord Strike
AlarakDiscordStrike.ShortTooltip: Damage and silence enemies in an area
AlarakDiscordStrike.FullTooltip: After a <c val="#TooltipNumbers">0.5</c> second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take <c val="#TooltipNumbers">175</c> damage and are silenced for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.5</c> seconds.

AlarakSadismDummyUI.name: Sadism
AlarakSadismDummyUI.ShortTooltip: Alarak deals increased damage and has increased self-healing against enemy Heroes
AlarakSadismDummyUI.FullTooltip: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes.Repeatable Quest: Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

AlarakSustainingPower.name: Sustaining Power
AlarakSustainingPower.FullTooltip: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">40%</c>.

Level4Talent.name: Level4Talent
Level4Talent.FullTooltip: Burrow to the target location, dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">96~~0.04~~</c> damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by <c val="#TooltipNumbers">25%</c> for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">2.5</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.

AlarakHeroicAbilityDeadlyCharge.name: Deadly Charge
AlarakHeroicAbilityDeadlyCharge.ShortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
AlarakHeroicAbilityDeadlyCharge.FullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing <c val="#TooltipNumbers">200</c> damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1.6</c> seconds.<n/><n/>Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

AlarakHeroicAbilityCounterStrike.name: Counter-Strike
AlarakHeroicAbilityCounterStrike.ShortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
AlarakHeroicAbilityCounterStrike.FullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for <c val="#TooltipNumbers">1</c> second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals <c val="#TooltipNumbers">275</c> damage.
